title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Inquiry-Based Introduction to Relativity Theory—Online Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational physics and math knowledge
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can explain fundamental principles of relativity theory (light speed invariance, relativity of simultaneity, etc.) and connect them to experimental cases
Students develop critical thinking skills to analyze the relativity of spacetime using thought experiments (e.g., twin paradox)
Students can solve simple relativity problems by applying mathematical tools (Lorentz transformations, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
